name: Timeist
description:
Timeist is a metroidvania game where you travel to different time periods on the same map. This game was made for the Gamedev.tv community game jam

credits:

Patrick Larsen (weRthem)
- General programming
- Animations
- Player animations
- Art
- Level Design
Tait Larsen (Cancelpro)
- Character programming
- Art
- Level Design
Ericka Larsen
- Art
Warren Bradt (Half A Tool, Flinaudio)
- Music
- Audio programming
- SFX
- Level Design
Jesse Anderson
- Player Design
- Player animations
